Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whaaat?
I already did magic on you today!
Come back tomorrow!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What I reeeeeaalllly want right now is
<RED>grapes</RED>...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Mushrooms, mushrooms, those certain
special mushrooms.
That's what I want!
<PAGE>
Bring those mushrooms in your bag when
you come to see me, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I want <RED>a treat with grapes in it</RED>!
Unless you come to me bringing that,
forget it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>!
Welcome!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It looks like you have what
I want in your bag!
<PAGE>
Well, what appearance do you want me
to give you?
Choose!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's the same as you are now!
How boring!
Choose something else!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've magically taken the
<GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>
out of your bag!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now let us begin!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh-ho! It seems that this is the
<BLUE>30th time</BLUE> time my magic has
changed your appearance, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Proof of how much you value my magic!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, it's done!
Now show gratitude for my mighty magic!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whew, I'm exhausted...
I'm not going to do any more magic
today...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Behold the power of the Witch Princess!
Don't you feel splendid, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Behold the power of the Witch Princess!
My magic never fails!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Behold the power of the Witch Princess!
I'd like to see the Harvest Goddess try
to do THIS! Not a chance!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eh, you really want to keep the same
appearance?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>! I have a moment to spare
and if you have the right item to give
in exchange, I'll use my magic on you!
<PAGE>
I will accept <RED>grapes</RED>, <RED>a treat made
with grapes</RED>, or <RED>special mushrooms</RED>.
Bring them in your bag!
<PAGE>
If you bring them in your bag, I will
use my magic to change your appearance
for you! Simple, no?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You seem to like choosing the same
thing! Oh! But you did give me a
gift of <MOJI0>!
<PAGE>
What else can I do? It's pointless, but
I will work my magic on you!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I find it strange how my husband always
chooses the same thing.
<PAGE>
But you did give me that gift of
<MOJI0>.
<PAGE>
What else can I do?
I will work my magic on you!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Even though I'm just doing this to kill 
time anyway, when you choose the same
thing it's a drag!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But you did give me that
<MOJI0>, so I guess I'll go ahead!
I will begin!
